title: Password Generator
details: The application generates an unique password based on the user's choice, it can also be copied into the clipboard

title: RestaurantSearch  App
details: The app enables the user to find suitable restaurants nearby, and also sort the is findings by distance/price/rating.

title: Note Taker
details: An application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes. This is built using an express backend.

title: Fitness App
details: Fitpoint is a web application which  allows users to track their weight loss progress and fitness goals.

title: Employee-Directory
details: An employee directory is created with React. The application's UI is broken down into components which can respond to user events.
